name: Yorishiro of the Aqua
text:
You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Umi" in your GY; add it to your hand. You can target 1 WATER monster in your GY; apply 1 of these effects, but you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except WATER monsters.
? Until the End Phase, this card's Level and name become that monster's.
? If "Umi" is on the field, Special Summon that monster in Defense Position.
You can only use each effect of "Yorishiro of the Aqua" once per turn.
